name: MacBook Pro 14-inch (M3, 2024)
description: Apple M3 chip with 8-core CPU, 10-core GPU, 16GB unified memory, and 512GB SSD. Perfect for developers and creatives.

name: Dell XPS 15
description: 15.6-inch OLED display, Intel Core i7-13700H, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD. Lightweight, powerful, and stylish.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, A17 Pro chip, 256GB storage, titanium design, and pro-level cameras.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: 6.8-inch QHD+ AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 12GB RAM, 512GB storage, and a 200MP quad camera setup.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation, 30 hours of battery life, and crystal-clear sound quality with LDAC support.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S
description: Advanced wireless mouse with MagSpeed scrolling, ergonomic design, and cross-device functionality.

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9 (M2)
description: 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, M2 chip, Apple Pencil 2 support, and ProMotion 120Hz refresh rate.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra
description: 14.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, S Pen included, and DeX desktop mode support.

name: Asus ROG Strix G16
description: 16-inch 240Hz gaming display, Intel Core i9-13980HX, NVIDIA RTX 4080 GPU, 32GB RAM, and RGB keyboard.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Always-On Retina display, S9 chip, advanced health features, and seamless integration with iPhone.
